ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet *really long, sorry people*
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t forget that O Keils adds 8 to 13 pts onto your fire resistance.  This is quite a big buff for so little mana.  It is a must have when going against
ygData.messageBody:
>

Don't forget that O'Keils adds 8 to 13 pts onto your fire resistance. This is
quite a big buff for so little mana. It is a must have when going against mobs
with a fire based attack. The damage as far as I'm concerned is just gravy.

Malkin
It's friday and I ain't working. Now if only I could get EQ to run on a Sparc.

>
>
> O'keils radiation does pretty much suck. I don't understand why it was
> given to us because we don't (to my knowledge) get any other damage shields,
> so it is not like a series of spells or anything like it should be. I still
> use it a little at level 10 (and I think it does 3 damage now, not 2) to
> help our tank out a little, but I think by level 12 or 16 it will be out of
> my repertoire.
>
